data: `minecraft:projectile` sets the projectile item component. Projectile items shoot out, like an arrow.
`minecraft:projectile` requires the Holiday Creator Features experimental toggle to be set to `true` in order to function properly.

>Holiday Creator Features contains experimental gameplay features. As with all experiments, you may see additions, removals, and changes in functionality in Minecraft versions without significant advanced warning.
>To learn more about Experimental Features, please visit [Experimental Features in Minecraft: Bedrock Edition](../../../../../Documents/ExperimentalFeaturesToggle.md)

data.Name: minimum_critical_power
data.Description: How long you must charge a projectile for it to critically hit.

data.Name: projectile_entity
data.Description: The entity to be fired as a projectile.
